text: Bila kiadi kioki kidi mu luzolo lu Nzambi kimbutanga mambu mama mu beno : lueka bufula buwombo mu beno ; ndombolo yi nlemvo, lueka tina mambu mambimbi, lueka mona tsisi, lueka mona phuila yiwombo mu kumbona, bufula buwombo lueka mu kisalu, bufula buwombo mu tumbudila mutu vengi mbimbi. Lumonisa ti luisi zaba diambu dimosi ko mu mambu beni.
